Package cz.cvut.fit.household.daos.interfaces

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOImpl
public interface UserDAO

    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteUserByUsername(String username)
    Deletes a User entity from the data storage by its username.

    Retrieves a list of all User entities in the data storage.

    Finds a User entity by its unique username.

  • Method Details

    • saveUser

      User saveUser(User user)
      Saves the given User entity in the data storage.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved User object.

    • findAllUsers

      List<User> findAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all User entities in the data storage.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects representing all user profiles.

    • findUsersBySearchTerm

      List<User> findUsersBySearchTerm(String searchTerm)
      Searches for User entities based on the provided search term that is a string.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - The search term to match against user profiles.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects that match the search term.

    • findByUsername

      Optional<User> findByUsername(String username)
      Finds a User entity by its unique username.
      Parameters:
      username - The unique username of the User to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found User, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • findUserByEmail

      Optional<User> findUserByEmail(String email)
      Finds a User entity by its unique email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The unique email address of the User to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found User, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • userExists

      Boolean userExists(String username)
      Checks if a user with the specified username exists in the data storage.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check for existence.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • deleteUserByUsername

      void deleteUserByUsername(String username)
      Deletes a User entity from the data storage by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the User to be deleted.
